TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataRowCollection extends System.Data.InternalDataCollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class DataRowCollection Inherits InternalDataCollectionBase
public ref class DataRowCollection sealed : System::Data::InternalDataCollectionBase

summary.span: 表示 的資料列集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of rows for a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是主要的元件。The is a major component of the . 雖然定義資料表的結構描述包含實際資料的資料表，其中每個在表示單一資料列。While the defines the schema of the table, the contains the actual data for the table, where each in the represents a single row. 您可以呼叫並方法來插入及刪除物件從。You can call the and methods to insert and delete objects from the . 您也可以呼叫方法來搜尋包含主索引鍵的資料行中的特定值的物件和方法來搜尋單字或片語的字元為基礎的資料。You can also call the method to search for objects that contain specific values in primary key columns, and the method to search character-based data for single words or phrases. 針對其他作業，例如排序或篩選，使用上的方法的相關聯。For other operations, such as sorting or filtering the , use methods on the 's associated . ## Examples 在本節中的第一個範例會列印中的資料行 1 的每個資料列的值。The first example in this section prints the value of column 1 for every row in a . 第二個範例會將使用建立新的資料列方法，以。The second example adds a new row created by using the method to the . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataRowCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRowCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataRowCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRowCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: This type is safe for multithreaded read operations.

threadsafe.span: 您必須同步處理任何寫入作業。

span.span: You must synchronize any write operations.

summary.span: 將指定的 加入至 物件中。

span.span: Adds the specified to the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要建立新，您必須使用方法類別。To create a new , you must use the method of the class. 當您使用方法中，新會傳回物件使用的父結構描述。When you use the method, a new object is returned using the schema of parent . 在建立後物件和其資料行的每個設定的值，請使用將物件加入至集合的方法。After you create the object and set the values for each of its columns, use the method to add the object to the collection. 如果使用者產生的例外狀況中的，會產生例外狀況事件。Generates an exception if the user generates an exception in the event. 如果發生例外狀況，資料列不會加入至資料表。If an exception occurs, the row is not added to the table. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，將新到物件。The following example uses the method to add a new to a object. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataRowCollection.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRowCollection.Add Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataRowCollection.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRowCollection.Add Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果物件都有其設為 True，應該可以傳遞 null 取得該資料行的預設值。If a object has its set to True, null should be passed to get the default value for that column. 如果您在產生期間可能發生例外狀況，也會發生例外狀況或事件。Exceptions can also occur if you generate an exception during either a or event. 如果發生例外狀況，資料列不會加入至資料表。If an exception occurs, the row is not added to the table. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法來建立並新增物件到。The following example uses the method to create and add a new object to a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用方法中，物件物件屬於必須有至少一個指定為主要的索引鍵資料行的資料行。To use the method, the object to which the object belongs to must have at least one column designated as a primary key column. 請參閱如需有關如何建立主索引鍵資料行的屬性。See the property for more information about how to create a primary key column. 一旦您已經決定資料列包含指定的值，您可以使用方法，以傳回特定具有值的物件。As soon as you have determined that a row contains the specified value, you can use the method to return the specific object that has the value. ## Examples 下列 Visual Basic 範例會使用方法，以判斷是否物件包含特定值。The following Visual Basic example uses the method to determine whether a object contains a specific value. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用方法中，物件物件所屬必須有至少一個指定為主要的索引鍵資料行的資料行。To use the method, the object to which the object belongs must have at least one column designated as a primary key column. 當兩個或多個資料列有相同的主索引鍵值時，則會傳回找到的第一個資料列。When two or more rows have the same primary key value, then the first row found is returned. 發生這種情況時設為 false。This occurs when is set to false. 請參閱如需有關如何建立屬性資料行或陣列物件資料表具有一個以上的主索引鍵時。See the property for more information about how to create a column, or an array of objects when the table has more than one primary key. ## Examples 下列範例會使用陣列的值集合中尋找特定的資料列物件。The following example uses the values of an array to find a specific row in a collection of objects. 方法會假設有三個主要的索引鍵資料行。The method assumes that a exists with three primary key columns. 建立之後的值陣列，此程式碼使用方法來取得您想要的特定物件的陣列。After creating an array of the values, the code uses the method with the array to get the particular object that you want. remarks.format: ## Remarks 所指定的位置中的資料列的順序會反映只。The location specified by is reflected by the order of rows in the only. 如果多個資料列都會傳入陣列中，插入的資料列可能不會傳回所指定的位置中。If more than one row is returned in a array, the inserted row may not be returned in the location specified by . 比方說，屬性會傳回資料列中指定的插入位置。For example, the property returns the row in the specified insert position. 和不可能。 and may not. 當您撰寫的內容為 XML，例如，資料列會根據所指定的順序寫入。When you write the contents of the as XML, for example, , the rows are written according to the order specified by the . 如果指定的值`pos`參數大於集合中的資料列數目，新的資料列會加入至結尾。If the value specified for the `pos` parameter is greater than the number of rows in the collection, the new row is added to the end.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 移除資料列時，該資料列中的所有資料都會遺失。When a row is removed, all data in that row is lost. 您也可以呼叫方法的類別只是標記移除一個資料列。You can also call the method of the class to just mark a row for removal. 呼叫`Remove`等同於呼叫，然後再呼叫。Calling `Remove` is the same as calling and then calling . 您不應該呼叫在 foreach 迴圈中逐一查看時物件。 should not be called in a foreach loop while iterating through a object. 修改集合的狀態。 modifies the state of the collection. 您也可以使用方法移除集合一次的所有成員。You can also use the method to remove all members of the collection at one time. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法來刪除中找到的資料列物件。The following example uses the method to delete a found row in a object. 此範例會先使用方法，以判斷資料列集合是否包含一個資料列。The example first uses the method to determine whether the rows collection contains a row. 若是如此，請方法用來尋找特定的資料列，而方法可用來移除資料列。If it does, the method is used to find the specific row, and the method is then used to remove the row. [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataRowCollection.Remove Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRowCollection.Remove Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 移除資料列時，該資料列中的所有資料都會遺失。When a row is removed, all data in that row is lost. 您也可以呼叫方法的類別只是標記移除一個資料列。You can also call the method of the class to just mark a row for removal. 呼叫`RemoveAt`等同於呼叫，然後再呼叫。Calling `RemoveAt` is the same as calling and then calling . 您可以使用方法移除集合一次的所有成員。You can use the method to remove all members of the collection at one time. ## Examples 下列範例會移除最後一個資料列藉由呼叫方法。The following example removes the last row in a by calling the method. [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataRowCollection.RemoveAt Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRowCollection.RemoveAt Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
